Name: Balloonatics
About the game: Party Up Invite your friends and have up to 6 players in party matches or find matches online. Use your character’s special abilities to aid your allies and defeat your foes. Play with bots Bots can be added to solo or party matches allowing you to play larger matches by yourself or with a group of friends. Solo Challenges Put your skills to the test in our single player challenges. Compete in both speed and accuracy challenges to improve your skills while working your way up the leaderboards. Weapons With a growing variety of unique weapons like the Box of Bees and the Saw Slinger, plus unique abilities for every character, you can shoot your enemies at a distance or set traps in key places during a match. Environments Each level in Balloonatics holds a variety of dangers and challenges. From spinning saw blades to falling lava rocks, you’ll need to keep your eyes open at all times. Playable in both VR and non-VR Play against (or team up with) VR players and non-VR players at the same time. Balloonatics has been developed with both types of players in mind, and optimized no matter how you choose to play.
